import React,{useState,useEffect,useCallback}from'react';import{DndProvider}from'react-dnd';import{HTML5Backend}from'react-dnd-html5-backend';import DnDCard from'./DnDCard';import{getFavoriteMovies,updateFavorites}from'../services/favorites';import'../Favorites.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Favorites=_ref=>{let{user}=_ref;const[favoriteMovies,setFavoriteMovies]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const loadFavoriteMovies=useCallback(async()=>{try{setLoading(true);setError(null);const movies=await getFavoriteMovies(user.googleId);setFavoriteMovies(movies);}catch(err){console.error('Error loading favorite movies:',err);setError('Failed to load favorite movies');}finally{setLoading(false);}},[user]);// Load favorite movies when component mounts or user changes
useEffect(()=>{if(user&&user.googleId){loadFavoriteMovies();}else{setFavoriteMovies([]);setLoading(false);}},[user,loadFavoriteMovies]);// Move card function for drag and drop

}},[user]);// Save order when movies array changes
useEffect(()=>{if(favoriteMovies.length>0&&!loading){const timeoutId=setTimeout(()=>{saveNewOrder(favoriteMovies);},1000);// Debounce the save operation
return()=>clearTimeout(timeoutId);}},[favoriteMovies,saveNewOrder,loading]);if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"favorites-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"favorites-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"favorites-empty",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Please Log In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You need to be logged in to view and manage your favorite movies."})]})})});}if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"favorites-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"favorites-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"favorites-empty",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Loading..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading your favorite movies..."})]})})});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"favorites-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"favorites-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"favorites-empty",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Error"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:loadFavoriteMovies,className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Try Again"})]})})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DndProvider,{backend:HTML5Backend,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"favorites-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"favorites-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"favorites-instructions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Favorites"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Drag your favorite movies to rank them in order of preference.
